Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to defining retaliatory acts in the workplace and establishing an affirmative defense
Summary: Relates to defining retaliatory acts in the workplace and establishing an affirmative defense; provides that an act shall be deemed retaliatory in the workplace if an aggrieved employee is treated less favorably than any other employee; provides an affirmative defense for employers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to defining retaliatory acts in the workplace and establishing an affirmative defense
